text:
What's up, everybody?
Malachi here "For The Win."

Look, we all know football
is a lot of fun to watch,

mostly because the NFL
is full of incredible athletes
with unbelievable skills.

But what if we take those
athletes off of the field?

We thought it might be fun
to meet up

with some of the NFL's
elite players

at the Pro Bowl Games
skills competition

in Las Vegas to see how far
their talents can take them

in a series of competitions
which we like to call

"For The Win:
Challenge Accepted!"
All right, guys.

Now the moment
you've all been waiting for.

The real competition
at the Pro Bowl.

This is the Pool Floaty
Challenge

and guess how quickly
I can blow this pool thing up.

I think I can blow this up
in under 30 seconds.

I think I'm about to get it
in 55 seconds.
I'm going to blow this up
in a minute and three seconds.

Whoa, whoa, whoa.
Hold up a second.

Was that a mascot?
Are they in this, too?

All right,
back to the competition.
Ready? Go.
( exhales )
( screeches )
( cheers and applause )
Ah! I got it.

All right.
Capping it off with that.
( whistle blows )
( muttering )
40 seconds.
( muttering )
Thank you.
( mock sobbing )
Oh, my God.

Now that was
a breathtaking performance.

All I know is I got winded
just watching it.
For our next challenge,

anyone who doesn't
bring their A-game

is about to have
their bubble burst.

This is the Big Bubble
Challenge.

Hey, I'm about to blow
the biggest bubble

you guys have ever seen
in this bubble gum challenge.
How many pieces are we allowed?

I bet I can blow a bubble
bigger than anyone in the NFL.

- Let's go.
- Good bubbles.
( music playing )

Wow! You can tell
these guys even work

on their jaw muscles
in the off season.

It's a lot of chewing.
Here we go.

This is going to be the biggest
bubble you've ever seen.
No, no.
( laughs )

That's all I got.
I don't know.

- ( laughter )
- I can't do it.

Pro Bowl bubble blower
that guy is not.

Try and say that three times
really fast.

Pro Bowl bubble blower,
Pro Bowl bubble bor--

I'm not even going to try.
But you guys have fun.
( music continues )
Okay.
Aww. This stuff ain't working.
No!
Oh!
( applause )
That's all I got!
Wow. Okay, that whole thing

could've really blown up
in his face,
but he stuck it out

to come out on top
in the end.

I hope you guys enjoyed that
as much as I did.

I'm totally going to try these
challenges at home

to see how I stack up against
the NFL's best.
And don't forget to check out
Monday Night Football
on ESPN all season long
to see more action
from these players.
I'm Malachi and this
has been "For The Win."
See you next time.
